page.title: 10Inversnaid the Garrison
page.content: The old Garrison of Inversnaid stands on a knowe overlooking the old pass from Loch Katrine to Loch Lomond at the confluence of the Snaid and Arklet. It was built in 1719 after the '15 rebellion to control the Highlanders especially{MacGregors,}led by Rob Roy. There is a{legend}that just before completion the builders were sitting round the fire one evening when a knock was heard on the door. When they answered it a band of MacGregors burst in,piled all the wood up,sent the builders off into the night and set fire to the place. It was a two storeyed building,built round a central courtyard. Only a few of the walls remain. Garrison Farm now stands on the site. It is the setting for the {Inversnaid Sheepdog Trials. }
